mapper.update: update order_address set priority_level=99 where 1=1 and address_id not in (#{address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER});
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_nickname,s.store_name,s.store_price,s.store_picture,s.add_date,s.store_type,s.status_state,s.store_service,s.store_intro FROM store_basics s LEFT JOIN user_basics u ON (s.user_basics_id=u.user_basics_id) WHERE 1=1 and store_id=#{store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
